about_the_game:
Welcome to Elderwood Online - A New Chapter in Classic Adventure

🌲 Dive back into the essence of MMORPGs with Elderwood Online, where we pay homage to the beloved classics of the late '90s and early 2000s, infused with a touch of today's innovation. Elderwood Online marries the nostalgia of golden-age MMOs with fresh adventures and discoveries.

Why Elderwood Online?

🏹 Classic Heart, Modern Soul: A seamless blend of traditional gameplay enriched with contemporary mechanics.
📖 A World of Myths and Magic: Explore a realm where ancient myths live, offering endless adventures and stories waiting to be told.
🧙‍♂️ Craft Your Legend: Whether joining forces with allies, embarking on solo quests, crafting, forging, mining, or testing your might in PvP, your journey is yours to define.
🌍 Simple Joys, Epic Journeys: From casual exploration to intense battles, Elderwood is a place for all to forge memories and legends alike.
Embark on Your Adventure
Elderwood Online invites you to a world where every login is a step into a story that could be yours. Here, adventures come in all sizes, and legends are born from humble beginnings.

Elderwood Online: An Independent Endeavor

Elderwood Online stands as a testament to the power of independent game development, brought to life by the passion and dedication of Ratatosk of Elderwood, a Brazilian solo indie game developer. This project is a labor of love, unaffiliated with any larger entities, and is driven by a commitment to sustainability rather than profit.

My Promise to You:

Sustainable Development: Elderwood Online aims to sustain itself through thoughtful monetization strategies that respect the game's balance and integrity.
Fair Play: We pledge that any form of monetization will be carefully designed to ensure it does not disrupt the competitive fairness of the game, with a focus on cosmetics and other extras.
Community-Centric: The heart of Elderwood Online beats with its community. We are committed to maintaining an environment where players’ experiences and enjoyment are paramount, free from exploitative practices.
We embark on this journey with transparency and a commitment to uphold the principles of fair play and sustainability. Elderwood Online is more than just a game; it's a community, an adventure, and a shared experience. Thank you for being a part of this journey.

legal_notice:
Elderwood Online - Copyright Notice

All content included within Elderwood Online, such as text, graphics, logos, images, as well as the compilation thereof, and any software used on the site, is the property of Ratatosk of Elderwood, the developer and publisher of the project, and protected by copyright and international copyright laws. The game Elderwood Online, including all intellectual property rights therein and thereto, is the exclusive property of Ratatosk of Elderwood.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: Elderwood Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
